wikipedia_page.main: Bad Boys Inc were a British boy band, formed in 1993 by the record producer, Ian Levine. Signed to A&M Records, the members were David W. Ross (born 15 March 1974 in Bornemouth), Matthew Pateman (born 14 May 1971 in Sidcup, Kent), Tony Dowding (born 6 September 1972 in Welwyn Garden City) and Ally Begg (born 21 August 1973 in Bury St Edmonds).

response: Matthew Pateman is Professor of Popular Aesthetics and has worked as Head of Department at Kingston and Sheffield Hallam universities, and is now at Edge Hill University.
*You Say Tomato: Englishness in Buffy the Vampire Slayer by Matthew Pateman (PDF file)
